name: LOUDOUN COUNTY, VA
sampleDescriptions: Support the Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act, Firefighter Cancer Registry Act and Fire Act Reauthorization.
Support preservation of tax-exempt municipal bonds, and efforts to a bill to classify municipal bonds as high-quality assets. H.R. 1624/S. 828.
Support legislation to accelerate broadband deployment
FY 18 and FY 19 Budget and Appropriations
FY 19 Budget and Appropriations; identify priority programs.
